sourceMeaningMnemonic: This is another kanji that is the same as the radical. Both <radical>tree</radical> and <kanji>tree</kanji> are the same in looks and meaning.
meaningInfo: So, how are those radicals doing? Do you know them well?
readingMnemonic: You’re walking through the trees, looking at them. They look ominous. Suddenly, you trip and fall. The trees start to <reading>mock</reading> you. Even the mocking birds mock you. It’s terrible. It’s painful. You’re being mocked as you pull yourself up off the ground.
readingInfo: Feel the shame, feel the irritation. Make yourself want to run away from those dumb trees that are mocking you.
